scripts.clean-repo: find . -name "node_modules" -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -name "dist" -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -name "tsconfig.tsbuildinfo" -type f -exec rm -f {} +
scripts.setup:local: docker-compose down && docker-compose up -d --wait && npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- pnpm api prisma db push
scripts.setup:test: docker-compose down && docker-compose up -d --wait && npx dotenv-cli -e .env.test -- pnpm api prisma db push --force-reset
scripts.reset:test: npx dotenv-cli -e .env.test -- pnpm api prisma db push --force-reset
